title: The Art Of Sampling: Stolen, Not Copied
teaser: The 1984 hit "La Di Da Di," by rappers Slick Rick and Doug E. Fresh, has become one of the most sampled songs of all time. Music producer Mark Ronson talks with Guy Raz, host of NPR's TED Radio Hour.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
